title: Community Spotlight with James Amaral from Slasher Tees
content: On this episode, host Nathan Barker speaks with James Amaral from Slasher Tees.  They talk about what got James started in the shirt business and his love for the horror genre.  You can find more information about his products at slasher-tees.com or on facebook @slasherteecreations.
